name: The Ballphin Game
description:
YOU, Ballphin, is a dolphin with the expertise to control a ball. This aquarium has imprisoned you to perform stunts and dislikes your natural behaviour of throwing balls at things. Find a way to escape the aquarium's control and go back to the open sea!

Controls:

Move: A and D

Blow ball:  hold left mouse button

Release ball: release left mouse button

Bark: click right mouse button

Pause: Esc

Artists:

@JL L and @Yuff at itch.io
